Instrument_PDS3.instrument_desc: Instrument Overview =================== The International Halley Watch Astrometry Discipline Network coordinated and collected ground-based astrometric observations of 1P/Halley during its 1986 apparition. 430 observers working at 148 observatories around the world contributed data to the final archive. While the name and location of each observatory are systematically recorded in the archive, details of instrumentation are not. What information was supplied by the observers in their comments has been preserved in its original form.
